channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 19:48 Air alert in Mykolaiv region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 19:48 Air alert in Mykolaiv region. Follow further messages. #Mykolaiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 18:10 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in the Pokrovsk territorial community. Take shelter!
